sentences.en: " We will produce the skeleton of that cat.
sentences.cn: “ 我们会把那只死猫的残骸拿来给大家看的.

sentences.en: A long illness made a skeleton out of him.
sentences.cn: 长期的卧病使他骨瘦如柴.

sentences.en: A skeleton staff of 20 is being kept on.
Her body was so thin that one could almost see her skeleton.
sentences.cn: 她那么瘦,几乎都能看清她的骨头架子.

sentences.en: Her notes gave us just the bare skeleton of her theory.
sentences.cn: 她的笔记只给我们提供了她的理论的梗概.

sentences.en: His boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨.

sentences.en: Only a skeleton staff remains to show anyone interested around the site.
sentences.cn: 只有一小部分必需的工作人员留在那里，带有兴趣的人参观遗址。

sentences.en: She told me about the skeleton of her new novel.
sentences.cn: 她把自己一部新小说的梗概对我讲了一遍.

sentences.en: Skeleton Island E . S . E . and by E.
The block is still just a skeleton of girders.
sentences.cn: 这片建筑还只是仅有主梁的骨架.

sentences.en: The boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨.

sentences.en: The human skeleton consists of 206 bones.
sentences.cn: 人的骨骼由206块骨头组成。

sentences.en: The police unearthed a skeleton in his garden.
sentences.cn: 警方从他的花园里挖出一具骷髅.

sentences.en: The skeleton consists of differently shaped bones held together by ligaments.
sentences.cn: 人体骨架是由依靠韧带连接的形状相异的骨头构成。

sentences.en: This was worse than " a terrible secret "; this was a real skeleton!
sentences.cn: 这比 “ 骇人听闻的秘密 ” 还要糟; 这是一具真骷髅!

sentences.en: We agreed on a skeleton outline of the proposal.
sentences.cn: 我们给提案商定了一个基本框架。

words.tran_cn: 骨骼的，像骨骼的；骸骨的；骨瘦如柴的
[解剖]骨骼的；骨瘦如柴的；概略的
轮廓,草稿,概要,蓝图,模型

phrases.tran_cn: 家丑：被隐藏起来的羞耻或丢脸的原始资料，例如一家庭内

trans.tran_cn: 骨骼的；骨瘦如柴的；概略的

trans.tran_en: the structure consisting of all the bones in a human or animal body
